message.raw:
Remove MutableComponent and MutableEach in favor of const.

This will make sure that attempting to obtain mutable Components from a const
EntityComponentManager will raise a compilation error.  It would then force
the user to do an (obviously unsafe) const_cast on a const EntityComponentManager.
message.html:
